thread.title: U.S. Sanctions Top Venezuelan Official Diosdado Cabello Rondón

author: Ian Talley
title: U.S. Sanctions Top Venezuelan Official Diosdado Cabello Rondón
text:
WASHINGTON—The U.S. Treasury Department on Friday levied sanctions against one of Venezuela’s most powerful men, accusing Diosdado Cabello Rondón of state-aided narco-trafficking and corruption, as the administration escalated its pressure campaign against Caracas.
The Trump administration has imposed a series of sanctions against President Nicolás Maduro’s governing elite over the past year in an effort U.S. officials describe as trying to return the country to democracy and penalize the Venezuelan strongman for alleged human...
